data:
Ryan used to work for mall security. He often worked the night shift. One day, he saw a raccoon in the mall. He stared at it for hours until it left. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ryan was blind.
- Ryan decided his job was rather dull.
Answer: Ryan was blind.

Chris was not looking forward to going to school on Friday. There was a difficult test coming that he was not ready for. When he went to bed on Thursday he was worried. When he woke up Friday morning almost a foot of snow had fallen! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Bill started to get ready for school.
- Bill felt relieved.
Answer: Bill felt relieved.

Mark was running late to work. He tried to get their on time by driving over the speed limit. A traffic cop pulled him over. He was given a speeding ticket. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mark ended up being late for work.
- Mark was early for work.
Answer: Mark ended up being late for work.

Gina and her friend Tami were walking to their classroom. Down the hall Gina could see he bully who had tripped her. Gina tried to keep her composure. She took a deep breath and put on a weak smile. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Tami bullied Gina until Gina started crying.
- Tami told the bully to get lost, and he looked intimidated.
Answer: Tami told the bully to get lost, and he looked intimidated.

Tony was tired of stale store bought bread. He called his mom and got her bread recipe. Tony gathered the ingredients that he needed. Tony baked the bread according to the recipe. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- It was some of the best bread he has had.
- Tony loved the pizza.
Answer: It was some of the best bread he has had.

Wendy bought some bath oil online. She misread the directions and applied it all over her body. To her horror, her skin had turned pink. She complained to the company promptly. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Wendy happily bought more of the bath oil.
- The company gave Wendy a full refund and apology.
Answer: The company gave Wendy a full refund and apology.

Betsy was about to celebrate her sixteenth birthday. Her parents surprised her with a nice dinner out and a small present. Happily, her parents gave her a monogram necklace. On the way home, Betsy misplaced the necklace in the car. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Betsy felt really bad for the rest of the night.
- Betsy wore the monogrammed necklace when she turned 14.
Answer: Betsy felt really bad for the rest of the night.

Jasmine did not study for her big math test. She figured she could just wing it. Jasmine soon realized the test was very difficult. She decided to cheat by looking at her neighbor's paper. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The teacher caught her and gave her detention.
- The teacher caught her and praised her ingenuity.
Answer: The teacher caught her and gave her detention.

Ron was watching a high-speed chase on TV. The cop was chasing the bad guy through his neighborhood. It was terrifying! But then the cop caught the bad guy. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ron started collecting bottle caps.
- Ron applauded the officer's performance.
Answer: Ron applauded the officer's performance.

I decided to pay a visit to someone I've been dating online. I never seen her in person, but I trust her. The airplane flight took several hours. When I arrived at the hotel, she said she's in front. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I got on the plane and flew home.
- I walked in and saw her.
Answer: I walked in and saw her.

I drove my motorcycle across the street. I took a path that led to a riding track. I did a few laps. Bored, I drove back home. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I cleaned my motorcycle after I got home.
- I changed the wifi password to enhance security.
Answer: I cleaned my motorcycle after I got home.

Brandon woke up this morning with his tooth missing. All excited he ran into his parents room. Brandon jumped up and down on their bed. He ran back to his room to put his tooth under his pillow. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Brandon checked the next day and found 50 cents under his pillow.
- Brandon bought a bar of chocolate.
Answer: Brandon checked the next day and found 50 cents under his pillow.

Jaime wanted to ask jack to go to the school dance with her. After school she waited for jack outside of the front door. When jack was exiting he was walking hand in hand with another girl. Jaime froze unable to speak. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jaime then told him that they were through.
- Jaime then walked up to him and gave him a hug.
Answer: Jaime then told him that they were through.

Ted's parents told him to focus on studies and not on games. Ted thought that games were a burgeoning art form, worthy of praise. Ted started to write reviews and articles about different games. The reviews and articles were published in national magazines. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- His parents relented.
- Ted was an orphan.
Answer: His parents relented.

Jon loved the night sky. He would spend many of his nights looking at the stars. His mom saw that he loved the night sky. His mom bought him a telescope. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jon then watched germs with his microscope.
- Jon used his telescope often.
Answer: Jon used his telescope often.

Fred always stopped at the same coffee shop before work. He got to know the attractive barista. He developed a crush on her. Finally Fred worked up the courage to ask her on a date. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She said yes.
- Fred told the barista to leave him alone.
Answer: She said yes.

Arnold was scared of bats. He thought that if they bite him he would turn into a vampire. One day he saw a bat in his bathroom. He freaked out so much he screamed. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Arnold took a relaxing shower with the bat.
- The bat flew directly toward the source of the scream.
Answer: Arnold took a relaxing shower with the bat.

Jon graduated from college and began his job search. He applied for jobs in his field every day. Three weeks after he began, he got a call. The person calling asked if he would be interested in an interview. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jon accepted.
- Jon rejected the offer.
Answer: Jon accepted.

Clara went to the mall. She meet her friend Sally. They had lunch at the mall. They shopped the rest of the day. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Clara was tired by the time she got home.
- Clara felt very lonely.
Answer: Clara was tired by the time she got home.

John was a student in law school. He was having a tough time learning all of the material. John decided to do something about this. He met with the professors and got extra tutoring. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Pretty soon, he was up to speed and feeling much more confident.
- His professors reassured him that medical school was no picnic.
Answer: Pretty soon, he was up to speed and feeling much more confident.

Eddie liked to watch people use metal detectors on the beach. He watched one man for a while. It had been over an hour and the man hadn't found anything yet. Eddie secretly buried a pile of quarters in the sand. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The man sadly found nothing that day.
- And watched the man happily get a ping.
Answer: And watched the man happily get a ping.

Trent's family owned a camping supply store. Trent hated camping though. Every summer his parents made him go on a camping trip. This summer Trent was in charge of keeping the fire going in the wind. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Trent charged two pitchers of sangria to his parent's room.
- Trent was careless and caused a huge fire.
Answer: Trent was careless and caused a huge fire.

Jim complained that his wife never did the dishes. She then complained that Jim never cooked dinner. The next day they decided to switch their roles. The meal was horrible and dishes didn't get cleaned well enough. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- They both decided to go back to their previous roles.
- They decided they would keep thing that way forever.
Answer: They both decided to go back to their previous roles.

My roommate is a slob. He never washes the dishes but always uses them. I found an old one with mold in it. The smell was atrocious. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I yelled at my roommate for being disgusting.
- My roommate was very pleasant to live with.
Answer: I yelled at my roommate for being disgusting.

Tom wanted a Chemistry set for Christmas. His mom said it was too dangerous for a little boy. Tom asked for a puppy instead, and his mom suddenly changed her mind. Tom didn't understand why, but he didn't care. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He was happy to get the Chemistry set.
- He was disappointed to receive the Chemistry set.
Answer: He was happy to get the Chemistry set.

Everyone loves grandma's peach pie. She makes from the peaches grown in the orchard. The kids job was to go and pick the peaches for the pies. They always made sure the picked the best peaches. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Grandma had to pick the peaches herself.
- They were excited to bring the peaches to grandma.
Answer: They were excited to bring the peaches to grandma.

Kayla borrowed a book from her sister. She brought the book with her to a coffee shop to read. Kayla accidentally spilled some of her vanilla latte on the book. She immediately went home to inform her sister. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Kayla was an only child.
- Her sister was mad!
Answer: Kayla was an only child.

Joy wanted to find the perfect shell for her hermit crab. She could buy one, but it would be more special if she found it. She scoured the beach all morning. Everything that might work was broken! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She had to buy a shell after all.
- So she brought one home and gave it to her crab.
Answer: She had to buy a shell after all.

Barry was excited that he finally registered to vote. He went to the polling place near his home. While walking into the building he noticed all of the campaign signs. He already knew how he would cast his votes. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Barry voted.
- Barry turned around and went home.
Answer: Barry voted.

A frog was hungry for a late dinner. He looked across the pond and spied a fly. The frog swam up to the fly quietly. Unfortunately, the fly saw him coming and buzzed away. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The frog had never had such a full stomach in his entire life.
- The frog was still hungry.
Answer: The frog was still hungry.

A man went to design the tallest tower in the world. He drew plans to make it twice as high as the current tallest. He took the plans to a developer to build. The developer asked him how tall to build the tower. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The Man was not a building designer.
- The man built the tower and it was grand.
Answer: The Man was not a building designer.

Reilly loved going to the fair. The petting zoo was her favorite part. She had fed a small goat before feeding the cow. The goat was trying to get more food from her but she ignored it. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Eventually, the goat became angry and bit Reilly.
- Reilly fed the goat extra food.
Answer: Eventually, the goat became angry and bit Reilly.

Greg was riding his bike to the store. An arm emerged from an alleyway as Greg passed. Greg fell from the bike as he was pushed to the ground. He watched from the sidewalk as a man rode away with his bike. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Greg filed a police report and they eventually caught the thief.
- Greg judged the chili cook-off competition.
Answer: Greg filed a police report and they eventually caught the thief.

Bill saved all his pocket change for 2 weeks last month. It was for a sucker from the store. He brought all his chance and bought the sucker. Walking home he tripped and fell. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Bill thought he was the luckiest guy alive.
- Bill was sad to see the sucker covered with dirt on the ground.
Answer: Bill thought he was the luckiest guy alive.

Sally like pizza night on fridays. The family got two pizzas one with no cheese. Sally didn't like cheese. But both pizzas had cheese on them this time. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Sally decided to order her own pizza.
- Sally was very happy to see cheese pizza.
Answer: Sally decided to order her own pizza.

Jackie had been a long distance runner for many Year's. Despite her very full iPod, she became bored with music. One of her running friends recommended an audible book. She loaded a new release to her iPod. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She listened to a book while she ran.
- She was glad she is never bored of music.
Answer: She listened to a book while she ran.

Pam's house was where the party was. Everyone bought gifts. Pam bought a cake. Everyone danced and had fun! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Pam was a lousy hostess.
- Pam was a good hostess.
Answer: Pam was a lousy hostess.

Cindy was at a restaurant. And she ordered hot soup. But the waitress forgot to tell her that the bowl was hot. So when received the bowl from the waitress, she hurt her hands. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Cindy went and ran cold water over her hands.
- Cindy continued holding the soup.
Answer: Cindy went and ran cold water over her hands.

Juan wanted to make tacos for his family tonight. He went to the grocery store and bought the ingredients. As he was preparing dinner he realized he forgot the tortillas! He wanted to go back to the store but it was closed. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Juan's mother showed him how to make a taco casserole instead.
- Juan went back to the store.
Answer: Juan's mother showed him how to make a taco casserole instead.

Laura decided to fly all the way to New York City. She flew specifically to get her hair done. She wanted her hair cut by a celebrity stylist. When Laura got it done she loved it. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Laura wore a hat all week to hide her hair.
- The compliments she got made Laura think the trip was worth it.
Answer: Laura wore a hat all week to hide her hair.

Bob got a rubix cube for Christmas. He struggled to solve the puzzle. Eventually, he was able to solve half of it. But, the full solution remained elusive. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Bob worked hard and then finally solved the puzzle.
- Bob then gave up on the video game.
Answer: Bob worked hard and then finally solved the puzzle.

Mary makes candles. She enjoys this as a hobby. Mary took one to her friend as a gift. Everyone loved the candles and asked to buy one. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mary was very happy.
- Mary felt unappreciated.
Answer: Mary was very happy.

George decided to buy a TV. He found a very nice TV that he wanted and went to pick it up. A few days later, George awoke to a surprise. His TV had been stolen. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He told the police, who said they weren't likely to find it.
- Things had turned out just as he'd hoped.
Answer: He told the police, who said they weren't likely to find it.

Rex is getting ready for a party tonight. He realizes he hasn't prepared anything for guests to eat with cheese. Rex runs out to get a baguette. He slices it into thin even slices to make it easy to eat. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Rex went on a long journey across the ocean.
- Everyone enjoyed the cheese and bread.
Answer: Everyone enjoyed the cheese and bread.

Joy wanted to find the perfect shell for her hermit crab. She could buy one, but it would be more special if she found it. She scoured the beach all morning. Everything that might work was broken! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She had to buy a shell after all.
- So she brought one home and gave it to her crab.
Answer: She had to buy a shell after all.

Joe felt confident going into his boxing match. He dominated the first four rounds. He got hit with a left hook that cut his eye in the fifth. The last seven rounds were a back and forth affair. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Joe eventually won the fight.
- Joe finished the fight with no cuts or injuries.
Answer: Joe eventually won the fight.

Fred went to the beach with his friends. He loved the water and the sunshine. His friends threw a party on the beach after the sun went down. Fred got drunk and passed out on the sand. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Fred rolled over and fell off the bed.
- Fred woke up with a hangover.
Answer: Fred rolled over and fell off the bed.

I noticed my hair was getting kind of long. I decided to try and get it cut that afternoon. Once I found a suitable barber, I dropped by for a cut. There wasn't a line, it was super quick! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I really liked my new hair cut.
- He made the best sandwich in town.
Answer: I really liked my new hair cut.

Gina and her family were leaving the park. They had been there all afternoon. Now they were going to her aunt's house. Gina begged to be dropped off at her grandma's What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Gina hated her grandma.
- Gina loved her grandma.
Answer: Gina hated her grandma.

My friend and I had a little contest the other day. We tried to see who could blow the biggest bubblegum bubble. We took different turns and would take measurements. When his was getting at it's biggest I popped it. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He was a little mad, but I just laughed.
- He never did understand the best way to fry an egg.
Answer: He was a little mad, but I just laughed.

Ace was playing poker with friends. At first he was having fun. Then he noticed something odd. One of his friends was sneakily cheating! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ace called out his friend for cheating.
- Ace was happy for his friend.
Answer: Ace called out his friend for cheating.

Ford was proud of his high GPA. He worked every evening on assignments in order to improve it. Ford's friends warned him that he was missing out on fun. Later in life, Ford became a successful lawyer. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ford was sad that he achieved so much.
- Ford was proud of his accomplishments.
Answer: Ford was sad that he achieved so much.

While eating breakfast, I saw a lady. She was cute so I called her over. She sat down and we talked for hours. We really got along. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The woman told me to leave her alone.
- I got her phone number.
Answer: The woman told me to leave her alone.

Suzy went to the ice cream store. She ordered a vanilla milkshake. When she tried to pay the man for her milkshake, he smiled at her. He told her that she won a special contest. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He told her she owed him sixty dollars.
- He gave her the milkshake for free.
Answer: He gave her the milkshake for free.

Skip's grades in school were getting worse and worse. His parents considered getting him a tutor. They noticed, however, that Skip was squinting a lot. They realized he needed glasses and not a tutor. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Skip's parents decided not to get him glasses.
- Skip got glasses and improved in class.
Answer: Skip's parents decided not to get him glasses.

One day I was walking through the woods. From several yards away, I saw a red snake. I froze immediately. I began to slowly walk backwards. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Then I ran towards the snake.
- The snake bit me.
Answer: The snake bit me.

Hannah was an amazing artist. She always had a natural gift. She decided to enter in an art competition. Thankfully she was able to win the top prize. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Her parents insisted that her grandmother did most of the sewing.
- Her parents were very proud.
Answer: Her parents were very proud.

The Smith's could not find their cat. They were afraid she had gotten outside and gotten lost. Everyone was sad when they sat down in front of the Christmas tree. Then they noticed her looking down at them from the top branches. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The Smith's cat meowed at the front door.
- The Smiths all cheered, and rushed to hug their cat.
Answer: The Smiths all cheered, and rushed to hug their cat.

Everyone loves grandma's peach pie. She makes from the peaches grown in the orchard. The kids job was to go and pick the peaches for the pies. They always made sure the picked the best peaches. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Grandma had to pick the peaches herself.
- They were excited to bring the peaches to grandma.
Answer: Grandma had to pick the peaches herself.

Amy wanted more space in her home. She decided to look for a new apartment. Amy found a new apartment for the right price near her job. Amy visited the apartment to see it in person. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She moved into a smaller, cheaper apartment.
- Amy signed a lease and moved into the apartment.
Answer: Amy signed a lease and moved into the apartment.

Jill was surprised when a handsome boy asked her to the college dance. As her roommates got ready, Jill fussed about her hair. Jill's roommates said they could help. Jill finished dressing into her toga-like white gown. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Her date arrived and complimented her appearance.
- Jill and her friends had a fun girls-only night out.
Answer: Her date arrived and complimented her appearance.

I wanted to do something fun. I looked for something cheap to do. I decided I would go swimming. I found a local lake beach to visit. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I drove to the beach.
- I decided to visit Vegas.
Answer: I drove to the beach.

George had an internship. He really wanted to get a full time job with the company. George worked hard and proved to be smart. A position opened up that George wanted. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He eagerly applied for it and was ultimately hired.
- So he decided to go home early that day and quit his internship.
Answer: He eagerly applied for it and was ultimately hired.

Al and Val were very close twins. They dressed alike, talked alike and were together 24/7. One day, Val was diagnosed with terminal cancer. She soon died, and Al was completely devastated. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Al and Val went out to eat.
- Al felt even lonelier as time went on.
Answer: Al felt even lonelier as time went on.

Lina went to see how candy canes were made. She watched as the workers added dye to the hot candy. Then, they stretched it out to make it shiny. Finally, they shaped it into a cane and let it cool. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Lina now knew that candy canes were boring.
- Lina felt a new appreciation for candy canes.
Answer: Lina felt a new appreciation for candy canes.

Mia loved being outdoors. One summer, she decided to go mountain climbing. She joined a club of people who climbed mountains together. They climbed the tallest mountain in her area. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mia had a great time.
- Mia wished she could be indoors.
Answer: Mia had a great time.

A man named Nick was walking down the street. He noticed a small leather wallet in the grass. He picked it up and it was filled with cash. Nick decided to give the wallet to the police station. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The police never found the owner so they gave it to Nick.
- Nick then kept the wallet.
Answer: The police never found the owner so they gave it to Nick.

David was an all around great football player. He was nervous about his next game. A scout would be there. This game would determine his future. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- David hoped to play really well.
- David really didn't care about that game.
Answer: David hoped to play really well.

Yvonne had always been overweight. For New Year's she made a resolution to start exercising. She began jogging everyday. In two months she had lost 23 pounds. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Yvonne was proud of herself.
- Yvonne felt defeated.
Answer: Yvonne was proud of herself.

Mike bought a new bike to ride in his town. He cycled from his house to a friend's house. On the way he met a group of kids riding bikes as well. Neiter Mike nor the kids were wearing helmets at the time. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mike didn't like riding bikes.
- Mike accidentally collided with the kids.
Answer: Mike accidentally collided with the kids.

I've been on an art kick lately. I received a drawing instruction book for Christmas. The book has a shopping list of necessary drawing supplies. I went to the store the other day and bought what I needed. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I decided I didn't like drawing.
- I went home and practiced drawing.
Answer: I went home and practiced drawing.

Connie's doctor says she is overweight. She recommended better diet and exercise. One day, Connie joined a gym. The next day, Connie was disappointed to not see change. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She was proud of her body.
- She hired a personal trainer to help her meet her goals.
Answer: She hired a personal trainer to help her meet her goals.

Lester has always wanted to be more artistic. He decides to try to draw a picture of a flower one day. He sits in front of a beautiful orchid and begins to draw. Lester's drawing comes out very well. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He hangs the picture on the wall in his living room.
- He decides never to draw anything again.
Answer: He hangs the picture on the wall in his living room.

Ted's parents told him to focus on studies and not on games. Ted thought that games were a burgeoning art form, worthy of praise. Ted started to write reviews and articles about different games. The reviews and articles were published in national magazines. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- His parents relented.
- Ted was an orphan.
Answer: His parents relented.

The flute that sits on the shelf covered in dust. One day a man comes in the store and takes it home. This man wipes away the dust. He starts playing a song. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The man did not like music.
- The flute sounded beautiful.
Answer: The man did not like music.

My family is sharing a bowl of popcorn. Mom is reading a book and eating one piece at a time. Dad and I are playing iPad games and eating handfuls at a time. We have played this game before! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Dad and I love popcorn.
- Dad and I hate popcorn.
Answer: Dad and I love popcorn.

Fred receives a specialty coffee maker for Christmas. He finally opens it after leaving it in its box for a few weeks. Fred decides to make himself a cappuccino. To his surprise, it tastes just as good as the ones he buys outside. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Frank will save about $25 a week making coffee himself.
- Frank switched to tea and donated the coffee maker.
Answer: Frank will save about $25 a week making coffee himself.

Josh liked watching anime TV shows. When he criticized one of them, its fans got angry with him. Josh didn't understand why they couldn't accept criticism. Josh kept his opinions to himself. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Josh then decided to watch anime by himself.
- Josh enjoys watching anime with others.
Answer: Josh then decided to watch anime by himself.

One weekend we wanted to see a movie with the kids. There were two movies they wanted to see. So we decided to divide and conquer. Two kids and myself went to one and my husband and our son another. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- After that, we got a divorce.
- Both groups had a great time seeing the movies they wanted.
Answer: After that, we got a divorce.

I decided to add a new fountain pen to my collection. I'd seen online videos of a nice pen called a Pelikan M800. So I went to the pen shop at my local mall. The shop had just the model of pen I wanted. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I bought the pen.
- I didn't buy the pen.
Answer: I bought the pen.

Joline went to the nail salon to get a manicure. The nail technician cleaned and trimmed her nails. Joline could not decide what color nail polish she would like. The nail technician suggested a design that used multiple colors. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She let the technician change her oil.
- Joline decide to take the technician's advice.
Answer: Joline decide to take the technician's advice.

Holly was a beautiful black cat that Lee loved very much. Saddly, Holy got very sick and Lee had to put her to sleep. Lee was very sad missing Holly everyday. One day soon after a little black kitten showed up at Lee's back door. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Lee decided to adopt a puppy.
- Lee decided to adopt the kitten.
Answer: Lee decided to adopt the kitten.

Linda and her boyfriend were hungry. She wanted to eat tacos. He wanted to eat fish. They both felt powerful, and couldn't decide what to eat between them. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Linda and her boyfriend ended up getting both.
- Linda and her boyfriend didn't want to eat.
Answer: Linda and her boyfriend ended up getting both.

Sammy had a terrible stomach ache one morning. But she forced herself to go to school. As she approached the bus, she thought of turning back. But she felt it was too late to change her mind. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She sat on the curb and watched the bus drive past her.
- She went to school and suffered through the pain.
Answer: She went to school and suffered through the pain.

Paul wanted to buy his wife a gift. Unfortunately he couldn't decide what to get. He fretted over it for days. Eventually it was his wife's birthday. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He decided to go golfing all day.
- So he gave her cash.
Answer: He decided to go golfing all day.

Ben was late for class. His teacher yelled at him. He came in late the next day. His teacher wrote a note to his parents. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ben's mother will now wake him  up  one half  hour earlier .
- Ben crushes his alarm clock and buys a chicken.
Answer: Ben's mother will now wake him  up  one half  hour earlier .

Sam was stargazing one night. Suddenly he sat bolt upright. He saw a twinkling, moving star! He ran to show it to his dad. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- His dad laughed because the star was really a jet with lights.
